original_text: Moses and Aaron went into the Tent of Meeting. When they came out, they asked God to do good things for the people. The bright light from the Lord appeared to the people to show how great he is.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 회막에 들어갔다가 나와서 백성에게 축복하매 여호와의 영광이 온 백성에게 나타나며

sentences.original_text: Moses and Aaron went into the Tent of Meeting
they asked God to do good things for the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 백성을 위해 하나님께 좋은 일을 해달라고 요청했습니다

sentences.original_text: The bright light from the Lord appeared to the people
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 나타나신 밝은 빛이 백성들에게 보였습니다

sentences.original_text: to show how great he is
